body:
Finally! After a quite summer, VTK-m v1.7.0-rc1 is finally out :tada: :tada: :tada:

This bring exiting new features, and bugfixes, find the tentative release notes at https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk-m/-/blob/master/docs/changelog/1.7/release-notes.md

Let me know if we need to change anything else in the package

ViB
title: vtkm: add v1.7.0-rc1
